game.title: Mysteries of the Lost Forest
game.objective: Discover the secrets hidden within the Lost Forest
game.description: The ancient tales speak of a mystical treasure hidden deep inside the Lost Forest. Your mission is to unravel its mysteries and find the treasure.

task.objective: Find the ancient map hidden inside Elder Kael's old library
task.description: The first step of your journey is to find the ancient map. Elder Kael hid it inside his old library. Only with it, you will be able to venture deeper into the forest.

task.objective: Follow the map to find the entrance to the Lost Forest
task.description: Once you retrieve the map, follow its directions. It will lead you to the entrance of the Lost Forest. Beware of the guardian creatures.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the treasure, and claim your reward
task.description: The treasure is guarded by a fearsome creature. You will have to defeat it before you can claim your reward.
task.location: The heart of the Lost Forest
